gurmukhi: inj Gr myro swDsMgiq nwrd muin drsn swDsMg myro inj rUp hY
transliteration: Nij Ghar Mayro Saadhasangati Naarad Mouni , Darasan Saadhasang Mayro Nij Roop Hai ?

gurmukhi: swDsMig myro mwqw ipqw Aau kutMb sKw swDsMig myro suqu sRyst AnUpu hY
transliteration: Saadhasangi Mayro Maataa Pitaa Au Koutanb Sakhaa , Saadhasangi Mayro Soutu Sraysat Anoopu Hai ?

gurmukhi: swDsMg srb inDwnu pRwn jIvn mY swDsMig inju pd syvw dIp DUp hY
transliteration: Saadhasang Sarab Nidhaanu Praan Jeevan Mai , Saadhasangi Niju Pad Sayvaa Deep Dhoop Hai ?

gurmukhi: swDsMig rMg rs Bog suK shj mY swDsMig soBw Aiq aupmw Aau aUp hY ]303]
